      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void RayTracer.renderImage(Scene scene)
      The renderImage method renders the entire scene.

    • Uses of Scene in cs4620.ray1.shader

      Methods in cs4620.ray1.shader with parameters of type Scene 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void Shader.shade(Colord outIntensity, Scene scene, Ray ray, IntersectionRecord record)
      Calculate the intensity (color) for this material at the intersection described in the record contained in workspace.
      void RGBNormals.shade(Colord outIntensity, Scene scene, Ray ray, IntersectionRecord record)
      XYZ component to RGB encoding of the normal vector at the intersection point.
      void Phong.shade(Colord outIntensity, Scene scene, Ray ray, IntersectionRecord record)
      Evaluate the intensity for a given intersection using the Phong shading model.
      void Lambertian.shade(Colord outIntensity, Scene scene, Ray ray, IntersectionRecord record)
      Evaluate the intensity for a given intersection using the Lambert shading model.
